title: Trump's 'big beautiful bill' passes US Congress
description: The massive tax cut and spending bill was passed by the US House of Representatives after being delayed for hours by Democrat minority leader Hakeem Jeffries.
content:
US President Donald Trump's massive tax cut and spending bill has passed the US House of Representatives by four votes.
The so-called "big beautiful bill" passed 218-214 on Thursday afternoon, local time.
Only two Republicans voted in opposition to t... [7438 chars]

title: O’Melveny Advises Broadcom on Sale of VeloCloud® SD-WAN Portfolio to Arista Networks
description: O’Melveny advised Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ: AVGO), a global technology leader that designs, develops, and supplies a broad range of semiconductor and infrastructure software solutions, on the sale of its VeloCloud® SD-WAN business to Arista Networks (NYSE: ANET), a leading provider of cloud and artificial intelligence (AI) networking solutions.
content:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

title: How Fast is the New BMW M2 CS? It Just Shattered a Nurburgring Record
description: The BMW M2 CS has already set a lap record, beating the previous one by eight seconds, and this is where the new coupe earned it.
content:
The BMW M2 CS is shaping up to be a great performance car. It’s been just over a month since BMW revealed the coupe, and it's already netted a lap record. Except the CS earned it more than a month before its official debut.

title: Which British tennis players are still in Wimbledon?
description: As day four in SW19 wraps up, how is the British talent faring, and who is in with a chance of going all the way?
content:
